TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDsigBase64Transform extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform

summary.span: 表示在 XMLDSIG 规范的 6.6.2 节中定义的 解码转换。

span.span: Represents the decoding transform as defined in Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用对象时你需要注册编码元素的内容与关联的原始数据。Use the object when you need to sign the raw data associated with the encoded content of an element. 描述的统一资源标识符 (URI)对象由定义字段。The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the object is defined by the field. 有关详细信息`Base64`解码转换，请参阅 6.6.2 一部分 XMLDSIG 规范中，可从在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。For more information about the `Base64` decoding transform, see Section 6.6.2 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的成员类。The following code example demonstrates how to use members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform/CPP/members.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform/CS/members.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigBase64Transform/VB/members.vb#2)]

summary.span: 返回 对象的参数的 XML 表示形式，适合以 XMLDSIG 元素的子元素的形式来包含这些参数。

span.span: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 节点的列表，这些节点表示描述 XMLDSIG 元素中当前 对象所需的特定于转换的内容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的输出。

span.span: Returns the output of the current object.

summary.span: 获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的有效输入。

span.span: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输入类型数组；只能将属于这些类型之一的对象传递给当前 对象的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

summary.span: 将指定的 对象分析为 元素的特定于转换的内容；此方法不受支持，因为 对象没有内部 XML 元素。

span.span: Parses the specified object as transform-specific content of a element; this method is not supported because the object has no inner XML elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不支持此方法，因为对象不包含任何内部的 XML 元素。This method is not supported because the object has no inner XML elements.
